728422f-a.text:
Arthur Kill Road, south side, between
Futurity Place and Token Street, showing the ruins of the Bedell Home. The house was built
in 1670.
Aboot 1905 (7)
By Eugene C. Putnam
From Staten Island Museum Collection through P. L. Sperr
